replies.body: To quote the professor... Oh my, yes.
Everyone, please leave your highly mature comments to yourselves...

The Heartseeker-esque Lulu cosplay is quite a cool concept and you've chosen great costumes that complement your body shape well. Never mind the idiots who want to think cosplay should be restricted to size 8 females. It's almost as if all they want to see cosplay for is a sexual outlet and they have no respect for the people who put the time into perfecting their art. ;)
It's actually supposed to be a Popstar Lulu! :)

I think everyone is forgetting the main point. League of Legends is more than just cosplay or a game, it is basically a community now. It is a way for people to express themselves and to show off their talents with cosplaying and fanart and fanfic about a well-crafted game. Because we are all here because we all love the game.  I think everyone should be allowed to show off their skills and passions. 

We shouldn't be saying fatties stick to fatter champs. We shouldn't be saying Asians stick to Asian champs, or males stick to males and females stick to females. Cosplay is the art of bringing fictional characters to life, and is COMPLETELY ACCEPTABLE and in the cosplay regulations to put your own spin on a cosplay.

We are all human, we all have great minds. Let's use them to be great, not stay in our little bubbles of ignorance.

I think that black people should only cosplay Ekko, Lucian and Karma

{{champion:35}} (jk)
What's it like being a literal potato?
dressing up az something you like is all its about Gj lad
Hey ^.^ you are so cute omg, do you have a fan page facebook page or a public account? I wanna see all of your cosplays possible <3

"Any and all negative comments will be deleted and players banned, because at Riot games we live in a highly filtered environment where only positive feelings exist. Difference of opinion is not allowed, just in case it results in hurt feelings."


Heads up to all those who want to post something other than "OMG SUPER CUTE XOXOX", save yourself the ban.

Lol I swear Riot deleted a bunch of comments. There was two guys arguing about size. shit was gold
